'''1.1 build 6''' (also known as '''alpha 1.1.0.8''') is the sixth build released for [[Pocket Edition 1.1.0|1.1.0]].<ref>{{citation|url=http://pocketbeta.minecraft.net/2017/04/changelog-for-11-beta-build-6.html|title=Minecraft: Beta Changelogs: Changelog for 1.1 beta build 6|website=pocketbeta.minecraft.net}}</ref>

== Fixes ==

* Fixed smoke/water particles flying off at crazy speeds.
* Hostile creatures can again hit with melee attacks against mounted [[player]]s.
* Fixed a crash when downloading texture packs from the Global Resources or [[Resource Pack]]s tab.
* Fixed a crash that could occur when trying to access XBL.
* Hitting an [[Enderman]] with a [[potion]] of [[Invisibility]] no longer also makes the block it is holding disappear.
* Hoppers can now transfer items into shulker boxes.</onlyinclude>
